text:
Nikolay and Dmitri rushed out of the flat. 

A man stood in the entry, watching. 

He waited for the porter to leave. 

Then he descended quietly, unnoticed. 

“Did he drop the earrings?” 

“Maybe,” Razumihin replied. 

“They were in his pocket,” he continued. 

“Everything fits too well,” he frowned. 

“Why?” 

“Too melodramatic.” 

Razumihin sighed. 

Just then, the door creaked open. 

A stranger entered, startling everyone.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The discussion reveals a convoluted explanation of events surrounding a jewel-case and the actions of individuals involved, suggesting a complex interplay of suspicion and deduction.
